div.p: R.M. and G.B. wrote the first draft of the paper. All authors helped to further develop and improve it. UV measurement data were provided by R.M., G.B., A.B., S.S., C.B., P.D., and S.R. Model results for ozone were supplied by O.M., P.N. and L.O. Data analysis was carried out by G.B., R.M., and B.L. These last three also provided the figures. The statistical analysis was performed by B.L.
